item.title: path_info or orig_path_info
item.description: The story begin when I was migrating my Codeigniter app from php4 to php5 hosting environment and then I change the uri_protocol config, $config['uri_protocol'] = "PATH_INFO"; And then the app crashed!

item.title: Codeigniter HMVC and Your own Layout Library
item.description: I’m trying to make a partial output from hmvc module, $this->obj =& get_instance(); and then I’m trying to load a view from some module, $this->obj->load->view($view,$data); This will resulting errors, it turns out $this->obj is only loading the global view of CI i.
